PiCam with a Large Snake

  • cd; ln -s pi-tronics/pi-cam-py/recvid.py
  • sudo cp pi-tronics/pi-cam-py/rc.local.example /etc/rc.local
  • http://picamera.readthedocs.org/en/release-0.8/install2.html
    • sudo apt-get install python-pip
    • pip install picamera

If you get a mysterious "unable to set inlineheaders" message, try

  • sudo rpi-update
  • sudo reboot
